title: Red chicken stew
ingredients: ['2 boiling chickens, jointed (best to get the butcher to do this)', '4 onions (1 chopped, the rest cut in half)', '2 (4cm) pieces root ginger', '5 chicken stock cubes', '2 to 3 Scotch bonnet chillies, seeded if desired', '500ml water, or as needed', '4 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '2 red peppers, halved', '2 to 3 tablespoons vegatable oil', '2 to 3 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 to 2 tablespoons thyme', 'salt to taste']
